医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肠道微生物与阿尔茨海默病之间的关联研究人员回顾了有关肠道微生物组在阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 发病机制中的作用的现有数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Associations- Between-gut-microbes-and-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Associations- Between-gut-microbes-and-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6b53bac-84ad-4ce8-9ac8-82057a30c03c Wed, 24 Jul 2024 05:22:00 -0400 Associations between gut microbes and Alzheimer’s disease
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，印度的预期寿命出现了大幅且不平等的下降研究人员分析了印度个人的调查数据，以了解 COVID-19 大流行期间的死亡率和预期寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Life-expectancy-in-India-suffered-large-and-unequal-declines-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Life-expectancy-in-India-suffered-large-and-unequal-declines-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31df753a-50cb-4533-837b-b96df91ba79f Wed, 24 Jul 2024 04:49:00 -0400 Life expectancy in India suffered large and unequal declines during the COVID-19 pandemic
重组带状疱疹疫苗接种可降低痴呆风险重组带状疱疹疫苗对痴呆症的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Recombinant-shingles-vaccination-found-to-lower-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Recombinant-shingles-vaccination-found-to-lower-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=365bae17-ef03-463e-aedf-37f7ced5e4b2 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 04:42:00 -0400 Recombinant shingles vaccination found to lower dementia risk
研究表明将口服皮质类固醇的使用限制在 90 天可减少特应性皮炎患者的不良反应研究人员评估了成年特应性皮炎患者长期使用口服皮质类固醇与不良事件之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Study-suggests-limiting-oral-corticosteroid-use-to-90-days-reduces-adverse-effects-in-atopic-dermatitis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Study-suggests-limiting-oral-corticosteroid-use-to-90-days-reduces-adverse-effects-in-atopic-dermatitis-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d0920fb-3c2b-412c-ab19-a50c1e3b3473 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 04:09:00 -0400 Study suggests limiting oral corticosteroid use to 90 days reduces adverse effects in atopic dermatitis patients
口腔-肠道轴：口腔细菌如何影响您的整体健康《自然评论微生物学》最近的一篇评论强调了口腔和肠道微生物组如何相互作用，影响人类整体健康。口腔微生物可以进入肠道，导致生态失调和各种疾病，因此需要对这些复杂的相互作用进行进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Oral-gut-axis-How-mouth-bacteria-impact-your-overall-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Oral-gut-axis-How-mouth-bacteria-impact-your-overall-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2a394cf-04c9-4749-a32c-87eb64e621e5 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 00:51:00 -0400 Oral-gut axis: How mouth bacteria impact your overall health
室内微生物组如何塑造我们的健康和福祉受城市化和建筑设计影响的室内微生物组显着影响人类免疫、神经和内分泌健康。这项研究强调需要创新方法来利用这些微生物生态系统来改善公共卫生结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/How-indoor-microbiomes-shape-our-health-and-well-being.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/How-indoor-microbiomes-shape-our-health-and-well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=276b7641-d4e8-4f6b-bf05-7327f7dc0e96 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 00:13:00 -0400 How indoor microbiomes shape our health and well-being
AI 模型 Virchow 在癌症检测方面优于临床方法在《自然医学》最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员展示了使用 Virchow 基础模型对病理报告进行计算分析、预测生物标志物以及识别多种癌症类型的细胞。 Virchow 的泛癌模型显示出令人印象深刻的准确性，通常优于临床级模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/AI-model-Virchow-outperforms-clinical-methods-in-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/AI-model-Virchow-outperforms-clinical-methods-in-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72f3ab03-f851-4e16-8116-f966eadc51f7 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 23:46:00 -0400 AI model Virchow outperforms clinical methods in cancer detection
膝盖骨形状可能表明一个人患骨关节炎的风险澳大利亚国立大学 (ANU) 的一项新研究表明，一个人膝盖骨的形状可能是一个指标，表明他们是否更容易患骨关节炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Kneecap-shape-could-indicate-a-persons-risk-of-developmenting-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Kneecap-shape-could-indicate-a-persons-risk-of-developmenting-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ee326e3-5883-4bf1-b40e-966b3c61a6f6 Tue, 23 Jul 2024 23:39:00 -0400 Kneecap shape could indicate a person's risk of developing osteoarthritis
综述强调神经系统疾病中隐藏的肠脑联系研究表明，肠道微生物群-大脑轴是通过微生物干预来理解和治疗神经系统疾病的关键环节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Review-highlights-hidden-gut-brain-connection-in-neurological-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/Review-highlights-hidden-gut-brain-connection-in-neurological-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fffeee4-eed1-4774-916c-b212a8648f5b Tue, 23 Jul 2024 23:15:00 -0400 Review highlights hidden gut-brain connection in neurological disorders
家庭害虫的杀虫剂抗药性如何助长疟疾死灰复燃几十年来，经过杀虫剂处理的蚊帐和室内杀虫剂喷洒方案一直是针对传播疟疾（一种危险的全球疾病）的蚊子的重要且广泛成功的治疗方法。然而，这些治疗方法也一度抑制了臭虫、蟑螂和苍蝇等不良家庭昆虫。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/How-insecticide-resistance-in-household-pests-fuels-malaria-resurgence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240723/How-insecticide-resistance-in-household-pests-fuels-malaria-resurgence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=befbda35-00f0-40fd-ad84-909b8a34b9ea Tue, 23 Jul 2024 23:10:24 -0400 How insecticide resistance in household pests fuels malaria resurgence
